EmailTemplate.subject: Stop by the TriTech Booth – See You at the New Hampshire Association of Chiefs of Police Public Safety Tradeshow, September 26
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
New Hampshire Association of Chiefs of Police Public Safety Tradeshow September 26, 2011 | Manchester, NH
Stop by and see us next week at the New Hampshire Association of Chiefs of Police 1st Annual Public Safety Tradeshow and visit with TriTech - Imc Solutions Client Account Manager, Mark Baranowski and Sales Representative, Dennis Noe. If you would like to pre-schedule a demonstration of our CAD, Mobile Data, Civil Process, Corrections or Records Management solutions, please call or email TriTech today.
Enter to Win a Law Monopoly Game at the TriTech Booth
Stop by and visit with us to see why TriTech is the fastest growing company in Public Safety and Medical Transport.
Complimentary Webinar Recordings: Getting the Budget You Need by Proving Value and Return on Investment Listen Here: http://tritech.ilinc.com/perl/ilinc/lms/vc_launch.pl?activity_id=pphzpcc&user_id=
Get the Grant While it's Hot - What You Don't Know About Getting the Grant Listen Here: http://tritech.ilinc.com/perl/ilinc/lms/register.pl?activity_id=fmkvzsb&user_id=
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121
